Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI is simply more readily available at all times to check any type of work and give instant feedback. This feedback however is not always 100% accurate or trustworthy and it takes time to fact check and ensure that it is correct feedback. This is not a worry with teachers who can be trusted with feedback 99% of the time. I do, however, want to point out that I do believe AI will be more accurate in the future.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: No, feedback is feedback and I know it is meant for my improvement and not to put me down. A computer couldn't hurt my feelings and nor could a teacher.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I think I have covered the main difference between them.
